document.title: Recovering Voices from the Past, Visions for the Future
document.abstract: The beat of the African-American historical drums ebbs and flows through time. My work recovers and uncovers African-American sheroes who marched to the beat of their own drums. These African-American women have been called foot soldiers of education, angles of light, and drum majorettes of educational progress. Tout their story so their story continues to live!

field.name: location
field.value: Carolyn P. Brown Memorial University Center
